resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103171</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103171</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770213044</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Volcanoes of other worlds</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vulkane anderer Welten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Volcans d'autres mondes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vulcões de outros mundos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vulcani di altri mondi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηφαίστεια άλλων κόσμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Volcanes de otros mundos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Volcanoes of Other Worlds explores and compares volcanism on other planets. What do we know about plate tectonics on other planets? Planetary bodies highlighted include the Earth's Moon, Mars, Venus and Jupiter's moon Io. Users can also link to Volcano World, an excellent web-source of volcano information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vulkane anderer Welten erforscht und vergleicht 
Vulkanismus auf anderen Planeten. Was kennen wir über 
Plattentektonik auf anderen Planeten? Die planetarischen 
markierten Körper enthalten den Mond der Masse, Mars, Venus und 
Benutzer Io. Mond Jupiters können mit Vulkan-Welt, eine 
ausgezeichnete Web-Quelle auch binden der Vulkaninformationen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les volcans d'autres mondes explore et compare le 
volcanisme sur d'autres planètes. Que connaissons-nous la 
tectonique de plat sur d'autres planètes ? Les corps 
planétaires mis en valeur incluent la lune de la terre, Mars, Venus 
et les utilisateurs de la lune E/S de Jupiter peuvent également 
joindre au monde de volcan, une excellente Web-source d'information de
volcan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os vulcões de outros mundos exploram e comparam o 
volcanism em outros planetas. Que nós sabemos sobre o tectonics
de placa em outros planetas? Os corpos planetários destacados 
incluem a lua da terra, Marte, Venus e os usuários do Io. da lua de 
Jupiter podem também ligar ao mundo do vulcão, uma Web-fonte 
excelente da informação do vulcão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I vulcani di altri mondi esplora e confronta il 
volcanism su altri pianeti. Che cosa conosciamo circa la 
tettonica di piastra su altri pianeti? Gli enti planetari 
evidenziati includono la luna della terra, Marte, Venus e gli utenti 
di Io. della luna del Jupiter possono anche collegarsi al mondo del 
vulcano, una Web-sorgente eccellente delle informazioni del vulcano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα ηφαίστεια άλλων κόσμων ερευνούν και συγκρίνουν 
volcanism σε άλλους πλανήτες. Τι ξέρουμε για την 
τεκτονική πιάτων σε άλλους πλανήτες; Οι πλανητικοί 
οργανισμοί που τονίζονται περιλαμβάνουν το γήινο φεγγάρι, Αρης, 
οι χρήστες φεγγαριών της Αφροδίτης και Δία Io. μπορούν επίσης
να συνδέσουν με τον κόσμο ηφαιστείων, μια άριστη Ιστός-πηγή 
πληροφοριών ηφαιστείων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los volcanes de otros mundos exploran y comparan 
volcanismo en otros planetas. ¿Qué sabemos sobre la tectónica 
de placa en otros planetas? Los cuerpos planetarios destacados 
incluyen la luna de la tierra, Marte, Venus y los utilizadores del Io.
de la luna de Júpiter pueden también conectar al mundo del volcán, 
una Web-fuente excelente de la información del volcán.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:SHAN DE SILVA
FN:SHAN DE SILVA
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770213044</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103171</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/volcanoes-of-other-worlds</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
